Headline: Singer Karen Mok’s Dolce & Gabbana robe touches nerve in China | World | The Times
Text: A pop singer in Hong Kong was forced to apologise after wearing a Dolce & Gabbana bathrobe in a video for her new song, amid simmering resentment in Beijing over the Italian fashion house “insulting” China.Karen Mok had released a video for a song on her new album The Voyage in which she wore a brightly coloured robe from the Italian designers.
